actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Childers.
On agreeing to the Childers amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 160, 1 Present (Roll no. 600).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute inserted a complete new text entitled "Second Amendment Enforcement Act" and is intended to restore second amendment rights within the home for self-protection purposes.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 110-852 to insert a complete new text entitled "Second Amendment Enforcement Act".
